content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 1.0, 1.0) which is currently using coal as fuel to smelt iron ore into iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure all required ingredients for crafting are gathered before attempting to craft an item. For example, the stone furnace requires stone to be crafted, which must be gathered first.

### Errors when using incorrect types in building parameters
- Verify that the parameters used for building entities match the expected types. For instance, ensure that the dimensions for the building box are correctly defined according to the entity specifications.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace with no ingredients
- Check the furnace inventory to ensure it has the necessary ingredients to smelt before inserting items. If the furnace has no ingredients, it will not process any items.
